tweet: I get asked every day which #ALTS to buy.   If you're an investor/hodler and new to crypto, here is your answer.   Buy a bucket of these 6 alts:  $LINK $HOT $RVN $BNB $REN $ENJ  They have all outperformed $BTC this year. They have also all just dipped. Great entries rn...

The reason I don't diversify outside of $LINK is not because I don't like other projects. It's because I'm not a trader & I haven't found another project with crazy upside yet secure enough to hold when I sleep at night, unphased if it goes down short term.

Guys, when $LINK took off after 7k sats, I never waivered for a min.  I have the exact same confidence in $REN. RN the price is a joke. This is the road to testnet, then mainnet and price wil be multiples of the current.   And FYI it will happen whether I talk about it or not.
